condition_monitoring_query_language.query:
fetch consumer_quota
| filter resource.service == 'compute.googleapis.com'
| { metric serviceruntime.googleapis.com/quota/allocation/usage
    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        max(val())
  ; metric serviceruntime.googleapis.com/quota/limit
    | filter metric.limit_name == 'CPUS-per-project-region'
    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        min(val())
  }
| ratio
| every 2h
| condition gt(val(), 0.90 '1')

condition_monitoring_query_language.query:

    | align next_older(1d)

    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        min(val())
  }
| ratio
| every 2h
| condition gt(val(), 0.90 '1')

condition_monitoring_query_language.query:
fetch consumer_quota
| filter resource.service == 'compute.googleapis.com'
| { metric serviceruntime.googleapis.com/quota/allocation/usage
    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        max(val())
  ; metric serviceruntime.googleapis.com/quota/limit
    | filter metric.limit_name == 'CPUS-per-project-region'
    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        min(val())
  }
| ratio
| every 2h
| condition gt(val(), 0.90 '1')

       | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.location],
          max(val())
    ; metric kubernetes.io/container/ephemeral_storage/limit_bytes
      | align mean_aligner(15m)
       | group_by [resource.project_id, resource.location],
         max(val())
  }
| ratio
| every 15m
| condition gt(val(), 0.50 '1')

condition_monitoring_query_language.query:
fetch consumer_quota
| filter resource.service == 'compute.googleapis.com'
| { metric serviceruntime.googleapis.com/quota/allocation/usage
    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        max(val())
  ; metric serviceruntime.googleapis.com/quota/limit
    | filter metric.limit_name == 'CPUS-per-project-region'
    | align next_older(1d)
    | group_by [resource.project_id, metric.quota_metric, resource.location],
        min(val())
  }
| ratio
| every 2h
| condition gt(val(), 0.90 '1')
